decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the submitted application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the Fire Safety Statement hereby approved and and thereafter maintained.Reason: In the interests of Fire Safety and to ensure the safety of all building users in accordance with Policy D12 (Fire safety) of the London Plan 2021.

The gates hereby approved shall open into the application site and not on the public highway and shall only be electronically operated. Reason: To ensure highway safety in accordance with Policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The gates hereby approved shall remain permeable. No solid backing should be installed to ensure visibility in and out of the site. Reason: To ensure highway safety in accordance with Policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
description: Erection of ground floor side and rear extension, first floor rear extension, and installation of gate along front boundary
